name: Escape Room: Beyond Mystery
storyline:
Welcome to Escape Room Beyond Mystery, where excitement, intrigue, and adventure collide. This escape room experience is designed to challenge your mind and provide an unforgettable journey. Perfect for your pastime, it offers an engaging and interactive way to test your problem-solving skills.

Get into the world of puzzle, challenges and intrigue with quest room Beyond Mystery which is a room escape game giving abundance of fun and excitement of solving classical puzzles and riddles. If you are a thrill-seeker and puzzle enthusiast then, you are at the right place because this room escape game offers you all that you need. This escape game gives you an immersive experience that will test your wit and problem solving skills.

Navigate through the levels and find the hidden clues as you step towards unraveling the mystery. This escape game promises you an experience filled with excitement and satisfaction. Use your skills and presence of mind when you are stuck and hindered by logical problems. This mystery escape game offers unlimited challenges to prove yourself that you capable of taking on the puzzle challenge and overcoming them through your sheer skills.

Rooms and the houses present you with challenging situations and you need to assume various roles and characters as the game play demands of you. You need to navigate through problems and puzzles to find your exit. The problems are logical in nature and you will always be presented with clues and solutions to come out of trouble.
summary: Get ready to play a new kind of room escape game developed by Escape Game Studio that specializes in escape games and puzzle games to cater to all the escape game fans. This escape game is packed with all features that a true room escape game player would love to play.
